column5: Is there anywhere on the net you can pick up whats going on in your city through some kind of scanner? I remember way back, we use to sit and play cards with my Grandma and listen to what was going on with the old multy station scanner radio. Anyone remember those?
Nope cant remember those...how old are you again?? LOL

here what's happening in Barrie   ok seemed funny at the time  are you asking if there is a website that transmits police fire and ambulance  or the internet not that I know  you can still buy scanners that will do it you need the more expensive ones that will trunk, follow the repeaters and the different freqs they use   police-scanner.info/
I did call you a friend.LOL   Yeah Terry something like that  Just like to hear why the cops and the other are flying by my place all the time. Maybe I get home before they catch me.LOL
Brian, you gonna be at Lakair this year? if so I have a Police Scanner you can have. I never use the bloody thing. all it'll cost yah is a handshake and a beer.   Gerritt.
Well the nip trip is a no go as I am fishing a tourny,would a drive by this summer do,on my way to the falls with the mrs,s?  Thanks for the offer my friend.
Sounds good to me... PM me when the time nears.  Gerritt.
